name: Neck-O
description:
Neck-O is a cute mobile infinite runner game, in which you squish and stretch a cute cat!

Eat all the fish you can and try to achieve the highest combo possible to unlock and upgrade awesome Power-Ups.

Complete missions to unlock cute accessories and skins to customize your own cat! Share your combinations with a fun Photo Mode in which you can play with your cat!

Features:
• Squish and strech a cute and funny cat!
• Endless infinite runner with 3 completely different stages!
• 41 accessories and 12 skin colors you can combine, there are thousands of possible combinations!
• 7 different Power-Ups to help you achieve higher combos!
• Daily missions
• Photo Mode to share your creations!

This project was developed by a team of two students over the course of 2019's summer, as a way to gain experience of actually shipping a small game.

This game was developed, in alphabetic order, by: 

  • Jorge Pons Asensio. 2D Concept Art and initial idea.
  • Valerio Marty Rodríguez. Programming, design, animation, 2D art, music, sound design.
